name: Finance::Quote::BehrNL
short_description:
A perl Finance::Quote parser for Behr.NL. 
http://www.behr.nl is a (Dutch) stock broker and provides many stock prices (e.g. Robeco funds)

See for more info on how to install:
http://www.ijntema.com/unrestricted/wiki/index.php
